title: Hour 3 - NBA Season Preview, Albert Breer
itunes:title: Hour 3 - NBA Season Preview, Albert Breer
description:
Dan considers which questions he would ask at NBA Media Days. And NFL insider Albert Breer stops by and weighs in on the artificial turf issues around the league.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
